main event: Traffic controller at Idlewild reported a UFO sighting on 26 September 1958.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at dusk and the object was described as blue-white and groundish in color,The object broke into three parts during the sighting,The traffic controller observed the object for about three seconds as it moved westward at a speed of 800 to 1000 units,There were other flights in the area, including TWA Flight 629, which was noted in the report,The investigation involved multiple USAF commanders and agencies.
sighted object: blue-white object breaking into three parts
